QuestData.Title: Heart of the Fen
QuestData.Description: The pounding in my head is almost unbearable but I must see this through. With all the spore samples I've taken I know where to go and what to do.$b$bI will find the source and spread... no! Destroy it! I will do what needs to be done!
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Khaano deeper into the Crimson Fen and deal with what comes.
QuestData.RewardText: That is terrible news. I will warn off all scouts from venturing to the Crimson Fen from now on. Thank you and I am glad you were not affected by the spores...
